certificates.description: One or more DER-encoded certificates. In some contexts (such as `VerificationMaterial.certificate`), this sequence has an imposed order. Unless explicitly specified, there is otherwise no guaranteed order.

X509CertificateChain.title: X 509 Certificate Chain
X509CertificateChain.description: A collection of X.509 certificates. NOTE: "Chain" is a misnomer in this context, since there is no one true certificate chain in most PKI schemes. This message should be treated as a generic collection of certificates for path construction.
